attributes.action: fast track global climate change policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a real issue, the nature of our democracy means that those still sceptical about climate change are able to voice their ignorant opposition.

Money is no issue, the British public WILL pay for a solution that gives our children a decent future.

No referendum, no compromise, If something is going to be done, then it must be done as soon as possible.

I still have faith that you will make the right decision for the people.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "fast track global climate change policy."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12024.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Environment Secretary Hilary Benn has written a message exclusively for people who recently signed petitions on the No10 website about climate change.

Mr Benn highlights the UK Government's commitment to seeking international agreement on a post-2012 climate change framework, and encourages petitioners, their families, and friends, to use the new CO2 Calculator.

Read the message here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13496.asp
